verses.verse: In the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of the <S%H4468>reign<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H5975>Stand<s%> in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> which <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7812>worship<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> thee to <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them; <S%H1639>diminish<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> a word: <S%H1697><s%>

If so <S%H194>be<s%> they will <S%H8085>hearken,<s%> and <S%H7725>turn<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> from his <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4480>way,<s%> <S%H1870><s%> that I may <S%H5162>repent<s%> me <S%H413>of<s%> the <S%H7451>evil,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H2803>purpose<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> unto them <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H7455>evil<s%> of their <S%H4611>doings.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> ye will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>hearken<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> me, to <S%H1980>walk<s%> in my <S%H8451>law,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you,

To <S%H8085>hearken<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of my <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> you, both rising up <S%H7925>early,<s%> and <S%H7971>sending<s%> them, but ye have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened;<s%>

Then will I <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> like <S%H7887>Shiloh,<s%> and will <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> a <S%H7045>curse<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

So the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H1696>speaking<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Now it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H1696>speaking<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him to <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> that the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8610>took<s%> him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> Thou shalt surely <S%H4191>die.<s%> <S%H4191><s%>

Why <S%H4069><s%> hast thou <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> like <S%H7887>Shiloh,<s%> and <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be <S%H2717>desolate<s%> <S%H4480>without<s%> <S%H369><s%> an <S%H3427>inhabitant?<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H6950>gathered<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

When the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things,<s%> then they came <S%H5927>up<s%> from the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H4480>house<s%> <S%H1004><s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and sat <S%H3427>down<s%> in the <S%H6607>entry<s%> of the <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> house.

Then <S%H559>spoke<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> is <S%H4941>worthy<s%> to <S%H4194>die;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he hath <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> ye have <S%H8085>heard<s%> with your <S%H241>ears.<s%>

Then <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> and <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> ye have <S%H8085>heard.<s%>

Therefore <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H3190>amend<s%> your <S%H1870>ways<s%> and your <S%H4611>doings,<s%> and <S%H8085>obey<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H5162>repent<s%> him <S%H413>of<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he hath <S%H1696>pronounced<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you.
As for <S%H589>me,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I am in your <S%H3027>hand:<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> with me as <S%H5869>seemeth<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H3477>meet<s%> unto you.

But <S%H389><s%> know ye for <S%H3045>certain,<s%> <S%H3045><s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> put me to <S%H4191>death,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> shall <S%H3588>surely<s%> <S%H5414>bring<s%> <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> yourselves, and <S%H413>upon<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H413>upon<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> thereof: <S%H3588>for<s%> of a <S%H571>truth<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H7971>sent<s%> me <S%H5921>unto<s%> you to <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> in your <S%H241>ears.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets;<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> is <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H4941>worthy<s%> to <S%H4194>die:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> us in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%>

Then rose <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H376>certain<s%> of the <S%H4480>elders<s%> <S%H2205><s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Micah <S%H4320><s%> the <S%H4183>Morasthite<s%> <S%H1961>prophesied<s%> <S%H5012><s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> shall be <S%H2790>plowed<s%> like a <S%H7704>field,<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> shall <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H5856>heaps,<s%> and the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> as the high <S%H1116>places<s%> of a <S%H3293>forest.<s%>

Did <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> put him at all to <S%H4191>death?<s%> <S%H4191><s%> did he <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H2470>besought<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5162>repented<s%> him <S%H413>of<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H1696>pronounced<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them? Thus might <S%H587>we<s%> <S%H6213>procure<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> our <S%H5315>souls.<s%>

And there <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H223>Urijah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> of <S%H4480>Kirjath-jearim,<s%> <S%H7157><s%> who <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of Jeremiah: <S%H3414><s%>

And when <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> his mighty <S%H1368>men,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8269>princes,<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1697>words,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1245>sought<s%> to put him to <S%H4191>death:<s%> but when <S%H223>Urijah<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> it, he was <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> and <S%H1272>fled,<s%> and went <S%H935>into<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%>

And <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H853>namely,<s%> <S%H494>Elnathan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5907>Achbor,<s%> and certain <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him <S%H413>into<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And they fetched <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H223>Urijah<s%> out of <S%H4480>Egypt,<s%> <S%H4714><s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> him <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H4428>king;<s%> who <S%H5221>slew<s%> him with the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> <S%H853><s%> his dead <S%H5038>body<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H6913>graves<s%> of the <S%H1121>common<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Nevertheless <S%H389><s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> that they should <S%H1115>not<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> him into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> to put him to <S%H4191>death.<s%>
